Key Match Events: Jacob Stallings' RBI double in the ninth inning helped the Colorado Rockies beat the Detroit Tigers 4-2 on Thursday.
Pre-Game Insights: The Detroit Tigers and Colorado Rockies faced off at Comerica Park in Detroit, Michigan, with the Rockies looking to secure the series win after being down 2-1.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in front of 19,538 fans at Comerica Park.
